about_the_game:
Release a marble so that it fills circle after circle with glowing light.

Clean the light particles to win points, then use these points to buy more marbles.

Let the marbles do their work, or click a circle to manually fill it. 

Play until space runs out and the level ends.

Make strategic choices in the skill tree

Once a level is over, it’s time to spend your remaining marbles in the skill tree.

Choose for each token color critical skills that will change the way you play : boost, automate, multiply…

Do keep a few marbles for the next level ;)

Create your own neon aesthetic

Choose your own color palette or pick among preselected themes, whether for accessibility or maximum visual satisfaction.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Processor: x64 architecture, 2-core 2.5Ghz or greater
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable GPU
